name: Debug Server
description:
Serves a webpage to a connecting browser that is updated at ~60Hz to display variable values.
The webpage does not need to be reloaded when the Codea project is restarted.

A demo is included.

- DebugServer.start(port) starts the debug server at the specified port, or port 80 if nil.

- DebugServer.watch(expr) behaves in the same way as parameter.watch(expr)

- DebugServer.log(id, variable) only displays a variable value for the frame in which log is called.

- DebugServer.update() should be called at the end of your draw() function.
